notes: Chinese manufacturer of Ginseng Extract with various ginsenoside concentrations for cosmetics and skincare. Fully water-soluble natural cosmetic raw material. Applications: anti-aging formulations, skin elasticity products, hydrating skincare. Competitive pricing ($35-65/kg depending on standardization) with MOQ typically 25kg+ for wholesale. GMP and ISO certified. China-based manufacturing with global shipping. Technical specifications, COA, and customization available. Multiple concentration options for formulation flexibility.
